description:
Description:

Disassociation of floating IP is successful with any server name that exists in the project, though the server is actually *not* associated with floating IP.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Create two instances 'S1' and 'S2' (wait till they are ACTIVE)
2. Create floating IP 'F1'.
3. Associate floating IP 'F1' to instance 'S1'.
4. Try to Disassociate floating IP 'F1' from instance 'S2'.

Expected result:
The error message should state that "This action is not allowed as floating IP 'F1' is not associated to 'S2'." and should return 400 as it is a BadRequest.

Actual Result:
The disassociation is being successful and returning 202 code.

LOG:
----------

[umamaheshk@HPOpenstackVM16 ~/source/csbu-qa-dev/nova/tests]$nova image-list

+--------------------------------------+---------------------------------+----------+--------+

|                  ID                  |               Name              | serverId | Status |

+--------------------------------------+---------------------------------+----------+--------+

| 5509c976-a040-467b-88a8-6a6566202bb0 | cirros-0.3.0-x86_64-uec         |          | ACTIVE |

| c1cde284-13a4-4b38-8514-ee45b76d2ef1 | cirros-0.3.0-x86_64-uec-kernel  |          | ACTIVE |

| e762f9e4-27f2-4a96-9df5-f60b97fc316a | cirros-0.3.0-x86_64-uec-ramdisk |          | ACTIVE |

+--------------------------------------+---------------------------------+----------+--------+

[umamaheshk@HPOpenstackVM16 ~/source/csbu-qa-dev/nova/tests]$nova boot --image 5509c976-a040-467b-88a8-6a6566202bb0 --flavor 1 server-1

| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:hypervisor_hostname | nv-aw1sg11-compute0001.staging.aw1.hpcloud.net           |

| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:instance_name       | instance-000001bb                                        |

| OS-EXT-STS:power_state              | 0                                                        |

| OS-EXT-STS:task_state               | scheduling                                               |

| OS-EXT-STS:vm_state                 | building                                                 |

| id                                  | 08d3f766-feca-4757-8a3b-6bc0c63b58e5                     |

| updated                             | 2012-08-03T09:27:42Z                                     |

| user_id                             | 94e561231d3c418e9ac36112613f6eff                         |

+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+

[umamaheshk@HPOpenstackVM16 ~/source/csbu-qa-dev/nova/tests]$nova boot --image 5509c976-a040-467b-88a8-6a6566202bb0 --flavor 1 server-2

+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+

+-------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------+

| OS-DCF:diskConfig                   | MANUAL                                                   |

| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:host                | nv-aw1sg11-compute0001                                   |

| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:hypervisor_hostname | nv-aw1sg11-compute0001.staging.aw1.hpcloud.net           |

title: Disassociate Floating IP with wrong servers ID is successful

comments.content:
Description:

Disassociation of floating IP is successful with any server name that exists in the project, though the server is actually *not* associated with floating IP.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Create two instances 'S1' and 'S2' (wait till they are ACTIVE)
2. Create floating IP 'F1'.
3. Associate floating IP 'F1' to instance 'S1'.
4. Try to Dissociate floating IP 'F1' from instance 'S2'.


Expected result:
The error message should state that "This action is not allowed as floating IP 'F1' is not associated to 'S2'." and should return 400 as it is a BadRequest.

Actual Result:
The dissociation is being successful and returning 202 code.

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/11694
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/11694
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/40753f30b102dce60d5aeead53becc27d0e53f11
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 40753f30b102dce60d5aeead53becc27d0e53f11
Author: Lianhao Lu <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Aug 21 10:37:30 2012 +0800

    Check association when removing floating ip.
    
    Fixes bug 1032558 and returns 404 when trying to delete a floating ip
    from an instance to which it is not associated.
    
    Change-Id: I30b4d8a318597d38c7afc01ee6d2e6842b999157
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
